attributes.action: Have all MPs tested for levels of empathy, and excluded if dangerously low.
attributes.additional_details:
It worries me that AI has been used as a cost cutting device in government at the highest levels. AI has no empathy.
It worries me that an echo chamber may not be held accountable for its bad judgement.
attributes.background: Its pretty self explanatory, phycologist assessments specifically designed towards excluding dangerously non empathetic MPs from running the country.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We unsure how empathy would be tested. We are also unsure whether you would like low empathy to make someone ineligible for election, or if you would like to require MPs to meet certain empathy-related requirements while in office.
